education.title: 國立臺北商業大學 數位多媒體設計系
education.description: 在北商大數位多媒體設計系的學習過程中，我接觸了遊戲與動畫相關的多元主題，涵蓋遊戲企劃、遊戲程式開發、3D建模與動畫製作的基礎設計與實作。此外，我也培養了問題解決能力，以及協作與溝通等關鍵軟技能。

education.title: 國立馬公高級中學 資料處理科
education.description: 高中時，我選擇就讀資料處理科，這讓我對程式設計邏輯、電腦軟硬體、網頁設計，以及商業概論、經濟學、會計學等領域建立了基礎認知。

experience.title: Creative director
experience.description: I can develop and oversee creative concepts for projects and campaigns managing a team of designers, writers, and other creative professionals.

experience.title: Art director
experience.description: I create and develop visual concepts that align with the project's goals and objectives, supervising the design process and managing timelines and budgets for design projects.

experience.title: Web designer
experience.description: I create logos, color schemes and typography for a brand's identity. Also I develop graphics for websites, social media and digital ads with applications that enhance user experience.

what_im_doing.title: Web Design
what_im_doing.description: The most modern and high-quality design made at a professional level.

what_im_doing.title: Web Development
what_im_doing.description: High-quality development of sites at the professional level.

what_im_doing.title: Mobile Apps
what_im_doing.description: Professional development of applications for iOS and Android.

what_im_doing.title: Photography
what_im_doing.description: I make high-quality photos of any category at a professional level.
